greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n, k) = [x^k] ((1-x)^(2^n) + 2^(-n)*((2^n-1)*(x-1)^(2^n) + (x+1)^(2^n)))/2. Irregular triangle read by rows, for n >= 0 and 0 <= k <= 2^n.
comment: Conjecture: for n >= 1 the polynomials are irreducible.
link: Peter Luschny, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1031
formula: Let p_n(x) = b(n) - (2^n-1)*a(n-1), b(n) = Sum_{k=0..2^n} binomial(2^n, 2*k)* x^(2*k), and a(n) = x*Product_{k=0..n} b(k). Then T(n, k) = [x^k] p_n(x).
maple: for n from 0 to 5 do A340263_row(n) od;
program: b = sum(binomial(c, 2 * k) * x ^ (2 * k) for k in range(c + 1))
xref: Central terms of the rows are A037293(n) for n >= 2.
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Jan 06 2021
